name.ja: <ruby>冥<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>骸<rt>がい</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>－メメントラン・テクトリカ

text.en:
3 "Memento" monsters
You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Mementomictlan" from your Deck to your hand. You cannot activate the following effects of "Mementomictlan Tecuhtlica - Combined Conqueror" in the same Chain. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can send 3 "Memento" cards from your Deck and/or Extra Deck to the GY. (Quick Effect): You can target an equal number of "Memento" monsters you control and cards your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Mementomictlan Tecuhtlica - Combined Conqueror" once per turn.
